name: Wild Card (halmual1)
description:
A lone ranger on his quest to clear out all the demons in his town. A side scrolling platform shooter with the art style of a pixel art game focusing on boss fights.

Controls:

A/D - Move player left and right
W - Jump player
Arrow Keys - Aim weapon
Space - Shoot
R - Reload
Shift - Roll ability

Player Mechanics:

Player has three hearts
Starts with gun (with 6 bullets and reload time)
7 Direction shooting using arrow keys to aim
Maneuvering with platforms
